zh.title: Atlas 200 DK简介
zh.description: 介绍了Atlas 200 DK的外观及基本操作，最后体验了人脸识别应用。

zh.title: 基于Faster R-CNN检测网络的推理应用开发
zh.description: 以Faster R-CNN检测网络为例，介绍了应用Mind Studio进行零编码推理应用开发的过程。

zh.title: 开发示例之寻找小猪佩奇
zh.description: 演示基于Atlas 200 DK开发者套件进行检测小猪佩奇的推理应用开发的全流程。

zh.title: 轻松玩转Atlas 200 DK
zh.description: 本教程端到端介绍了什么是Atlas 200 DK，Atlas 200 DK的部署流程及功能使用。

en.title: Meet Atlas 200 DK
en.description: Unpack the Atlas 200 DK and see how easy it is to develop a face detection app.

en.title: Developing an Inference App Based on the Faster R-CNN
en.description: Learn how to develop an inference app based on the Faster R-CNN detection network in Mind Studio with zero manual programming.

en.title: Development Demo: Finding Peppa Pig
en.description: See how an inference app for detecting Peppa pig is developed with the Atlas 200 DK.

en.title: Getting Started with Atlas 200 DK
en.description: Take a closer look at the Atlas 200 DK and see how it works.
